snippet: After a weekend of meetings, the White House was working on a list of new targets who would be barred from traveling to the U.S. or whose assets there would be frozen, officials said.
abstract: Pres Obama warns Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin against further disruption of eastern Ukraine as the United States and Europe prepare to expand sanctions against leading Russian figures; such targets may be barred from traveling to the United States or their assets in the US could be frozen.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon and Mark Mazzetti contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: After a weekend of meetings, the White House was working on a list of new targets who would be barred from traveling to the U.S. or whose assets there would be frozen, officials said.

headline.main: With Ukraine Tensions Mounting, U.S. Weighs New Sanctions Against Russia
headline.print_headline: With Ukraine Tensions Mounting, U.S. Weighs New Sanctions Against Russia
